title: THIS NEEDS TO STOOOOOP
body:
PLAYERS THAT OUTRIGHT JUST PLAY TO TILT PEOPLE, THEY OUTRIGHT PLAY BAD, THEY AFK FOR SHORT PERIODS OF TIME, NEVER COOPERATE WITH OBJECTIVES, FEED AND YOU KNOW WHATS MORE FUCKING TILTING??????

THAT THEY FUCKING PLAY WHITE KNIGHT WITH THE ENEMY TEAM SAYING THAT ME AND MY TEAM ARE THE ONES HARRASING HOOOOOLY SHIT THIS PEOPLE

RIOT PLEEEEASE

replies.body: What does the mute button do ?

It wont stop trolls from trolling.

Kind of like how putting a bucket over your head wont prevent you from having to file taxes.

in my question  i did not mention trolls... 
(sometimes i forget things and i ask random people what  that does)
its because of those little 'the player you reported has been punished' things they send out.  those are so fun to get that people actively try to find ways upset people so they can get them.
